item.title: Collaborative Documentation Driven Development
item.description: Introduction Collaborative Documentation Driven Development (CDDD), is an agile way of working within a software development team. Every agile team in the software industry has to create software products, versions, and releases are released quickly and frequently. This invention occurred because the software teams start the development phase without analyzing in depth what is going to be delivered. Here comes this process, in which you have to document the technical implementation.
